description: A popular fairy tale series about cute cats brought to you by Eiko Kadono, the original author of "Kiki`s Delivery Service"! An animated version of a heartwarming story that parents and children can enjoy together that teaches children about important feelings! An animated version of the new and popular fairy tale series published by Akane Shobo to suit modern children. The original work is by Eiko Kadono, who also wrote the original work for Hayao Miyazaki`s blockbuster ``Kiki`s Delivery Service`` and is well-regarded in the children`s literature world. The illustrations are by Mako Taruishi, who is best known for her work on ``Zokuzoku Village Ghosts``. A story about a little cat who loves mischief, written by Eiko Kadono, the original author of "Kiki`s Delivery Service." <Collected Works> "Chibi Cat Chobi" Chobi, the youngest of the black cat Meme, loves to play pranks. They left the food uneaten, tore the curtains, ruined Ken`s boots, and even left Mom`s precious dress covered in mud. After being scolded by his mom, Chobi runs away from home and goes missing! ``Little cat Kobi and her friends`` Chobi, who was a naughty child, became a mother and gave birth to a 4-year-old child. My youngest is a boy and is Kobi. Kobi loves to fight, so he even picks fights with toys and the TV. However, one day, Kobi jumped into a courier box and was transported to an unknown town, where he got lost after jumping out of the box! A big, kind dog rescued Kobi, who was heartbroken and weak.

titles.title: Chibi Neko Chobi / Chibi Neko Kobi To Otomodachi
ちびねこチョビ／ちびねこコビとおともだち
